meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Gypsophila, typically with small white or pink flowers.
meanings.sent1: The gypsophila in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I picked some gypsophila to put in a vase.
meanings.sent3: The gypsophila whispered secrets to the roses.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delicate as a gypsophila petal.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of gypsophila filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The dried flowers or stems of the gypsophila plant, used in floral arrangements.
meanings.sent1: She arranged the gypsophila in a bouquet for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The florist used gypsophila to add a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The gypsophila danced in the vase, showing off its dried beauty.
meanings.sent4: The gypsophila stood tall among the other flowers like a queen.
meanings.sent5: The gypsophila added a soft charm to the room decor.
